reviews.review: This happens to be the movie equivalent of life itself
Two words can describe this movie: utter shit.
BEST MOVIE OF 2017!! Fun for the whole family! funny jokes and a great storyline

It's main character personifies this movie perfectly. It is "meh". Anyone rating it lower than this is either a poor critic unable to be objective, or is just looking to get their review screenshotted for a hot take. It's no better or worse than what you could expect from the premise to begin with.
The movie wasn't good it was the worst I liked it better when it was just a rumor
By far a better movie than Spiderman Homecoming... It's up with the classics like Titanic and Beauty and The Beast. If I had kids, i would definitely take them to see this movie 10 out of 10!!
One of the best movies iÂ´ve ever seen.This movie is amazing! Soundtrack is so cool!

This movie was the epitome of what good cinema is. Do not listen to the other critics who rate it only as "meh" for they could not see true artistry if it hit them in the face. The jokes not only will leave your kids laughing but keep a smile on your face for at least a year. Better save up cause I recommend multiple screenings to truely appreciate this masterpiece. You will feel like a fresh smiley emoji for days after :))

Seeing this film being announced and then seeing it in the theater is the most upsetting thing I've ever seen. And I've seen people die. Stay far away from this film, don't even see it ironically, even if its the worst thing you've ever seen, they still get their money and that may warrant a sequel in their eyes. Everyone knows sequels are worse than the originals, and a film worse than this might tear a hole in time in space. Don't waste your short time on this earth witnessing this "film". Donate the $15 you would spend on this movie to charity. I know many of you are giving it five star reviews, as inspired by jacksfilms, but, seriously. Don't give this film any credit, god forbid somebody sees "46%" and goes to see it, and enough people do that and we get a sequel.
This was honestly the best movie I've ever watched. It was funny, heartbreaking, and had a great message. 10/10 best movie.
